label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_015
content:

### Events
- Post-bulk-change verification: compared TXT records across 20 external resolvers; stale answer rate returned to baseline.
- Migrated 16 additional zones; introduced automated check for provider record-set size constraints to prevent future apply failures.
- Rotated sync controller secret store entries with version pinning to avoid stale secret deployment; documented in runbook.
- Validated DS and DNSKEY alignment for all signed zones; scheduled next KSK ceremony tabletop exercise.

### On Call
- On Call: Shift: I. Hassan
- Pages: 1

- Status: Stable
- Preventive Automation Added: Yes
- Bulk-Change Effects Resolved: Yes
